plugin.name: AACplus
plugin.title: AACplus
plugin.desc: Pre SC 7.3.3 only. A Plugin Settings to enable playing AACplus streamtypes using mplayer. Requires mplayer to be installed.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: AACplus

plugin.name: FindArt
plugin.title: FindArt
plugin.desc: FindArt plugins provides easy way for user to locate and download cover art from Amazon. All processing is within SqueezeCenter plugin. It is not a bulk coverart application. Ver 2.05 has the following changes * Support for Amazon changed API. User have to sign up to Amazon AWS at http://www.amazon.com/gp/aws/registration/registration-form.html and enter Key access and secret key into FindArt settings. * Support for SC 7.4 2.06 has a fix to save cover art in a specified directory.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: NPRRadio
plugin.title: NPR Radio
plugin.desc: NPR Plugin to make it easy to find and play popular NPR prgrams. A plugin also makes it easier to listen to complete NPR Radio. Each program menu (e.g. Morning Edition, All things considered etc.) will list the program sgements which can be played separately. For each program, there is a "play all items" which will create a playlist of all the segments in the program. v1.02 adds the following * Support for American routes * menu item for additional podcasts * where possible NPR or similar icons displayed in Now Playing
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: TunerPlay
plugin.title: TunerPlay
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable a Analog TV/FM Tuner cards to be tuned and play FM stations through SC. Require VLC ( http://www.videolan.org/vlc/download-windows.html ) to be installed
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: SoftSqueeze
plugin.title: Softsqueeze
plugin.desc: Softsqueeze a Squeezebox SB3/Boom/Transporter emulator. Due to timeout problem with SBS plugin installer as SoftSqueeze.jar is large. The Plugin has been rewritten to download Squeezebox itself. This should resultin more reliable installs especially for users with slower internet connections
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: RTEplayer
plugin.title: RTEplayer
plugin.desc: This plugin provides easy access to RTE Radio (Ireland National Radio) podcasts (MP3) and Listen Back (RealAudio) There is some duplication between podcasts and Listen Back. The Listen Back are usually a complete record of the broadcast program with no editing but since it is in RealAudio it needs a server which supports transcoding. Podcasts are usually edited and sometimes just segments of the broadcasts program. PlayReal plugin needs tobeinstalled to play RealAudio Listen Back programmes. RTE seem to be changing over from RealAudio to encrypted Flash so it is probable in future only podcast will be available.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: PHCplayer
plugin.title: PHCplayer
plugin.desc: This plugin provides easy access to recent Prarie Home Companion Archive. The ahrcive is mainly in RealAudio but more recent programs are in Flash/AAC. This plugin only plays RealAudio version and so require a server that supports transcoding and the PlayReal plugin to be installed.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: PlayReal
plugin.title: PlayReal
plugin.desc: This plugin provides support for playing RealAudio streams and files using mplayer.

plugin.name: PlayWMA
plugin.title: PlayWMA
plugin.desc: This plugin provides support on Linux and OSX for playing Windows Media streams and files using mplayer. It is mainly used for player which do not supports WMA such as SliMP3, SqueezeBox1, Softsqueeze, Squeezeslave and Squeezeplay Desktop.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: PlayWMA
plugin.title: PlayWMA
plugin.desc: This plugin provides support on Linux and OSX for playing Windows Media streams and files using mplayer. It is mainly used for player which do not supports WMA such as SliMP3, SqueezeBox1, Softsqueeze, Squeezeslave and Squeezeplay Desktop.
plugin.creator: bpa

plugin.name: BBCiPlayerExtra
plugin.title: BBCiPlayerExtra
plugin.desc: BBCiPlayer Extra which provides Categories, A-Z and Schedule menus for BBCiPlayer and can add Now and Next program data to main live WMA stations
plugin.creator: bpa
